biotools.summary: eQTLMAPT is a fast and accurate eQTL mediation analysis with efficient permutation testing approaches. eQTLMAPT implements fast and accurate eQTL mediation analysis with efficient permutation procedures to control for multiple testing. eQTLMAPT provides adaptive permutation scheme which prunes the permutation process opportunely, and it models the null distribution using generalized Pareto distribution (GPD) trained from a few permutations.
